title: Clean Cut
description: Trenton makes a new friend at university, Bryant. Bryant is living with his swim coach, and starting to feel the binds of that relationship. His coach treats him badly, sets horrid rules and makes him do all the work around the house, something Bryant is starting to more and more resent.Thus, Clive and Trenton take it upon themselves to show Bryant what a real dom/sub relationship looks like. Bryant realizes that his current life isn't satisfying him and decides to do something about it.
author: Scribe Mozell
